title: Smoky Beetroot and Parsnip Soup
ingredients: ['4-5 medium red beetroots', '1 medium parsnip', '1 medium potato', '1 onion', '2 cloves of garlic', 'A big glug of olive oil', '1 1/2 pints (900ml) vegetable stock (fresh or from stock cube)', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper', '1 pinch smoked sea salt']
